name: The Second Summoning
description:
April Fool's! Take a bad game! 

I started developing this a couple months ago for a TTRPG I'm running, but I hated working on it and didn't like where I was going so I never released it. It's really bad, and would be pretty easy to take an awful message from, so just be warned if you play.

CW Fascism and Transphobia
